projects.title: Audio Key BPM Analyzer AI
projects.description: KIRO/AI generated music tool that helps new (or not so new!) music producers by analyzing the key and BPM of an instrumental file. Useful for autotune applications.
projects.longDescription: This tool is comparable in output to Tunebat.com's key and bpm analyzer. The waveform display was inspired by Soundcloud and the algorithm behind the analysis uses essentia.js. It's main use case is for analyzing instrumental music files as a music producer with a lack of music theory knowledge.
achievements: AI-assisted development taking concept to deployment
Responsive design with Chakra UI components
Audio key and BPM analysis with essentia.js
